thread.section_title: Vliegtickets.nl Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Vliegtickets.nl | www.vliegtickets.nl
thread.title: Rheia Obsines

author: Rheia Obsines
title: Rheia Obsines
text: Marielle was very good today My questions were answered and she clarified my concerns for my 13 y.o. daughter who will be flying alone. She was super! Made me feel comfortable for my (soon) flight for my girl's travel to the Netherlands. Great experience! Thank you so much Marielle. I am a happy camper today and great contact via whatsapp en messenger! Long way to go vliegtickets.nl!!
